Column {data-width=350 .sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


```{r}
# First input selector
  # View by sector or by hazard category
selectInput(inputId = "type",
            label = "Type",
            choices = c("Sector",
                        "Category"))

# Second input selectors -------------------------------------------------------

# Options for sector
output$sector <- renderUI({
  if(input$type == "Sector")
    selectInput(inputId = "sector",
                label = "Sector",
                choices = c("Aquaculture",
                            "Fisheries",
                            "Livestock",
                            "Crops"))
})

# Options for hazards
output$category <- renderUI({
  if(input$type == "Category")
    selectInput(inputId = "category",
                label = "Catagory",
                choices = c("Biological",
                            "Chemical",
                            "Physical",
                            "Socio-economic"))
})

# Render UIs
uiOutput("sector")
uiOutput("category")
```

### Plot

```{r}
# Import synthetic data --------------------------------------------------------

# Import
hazard_scores <- read_xlsx(here::here("data",
                                      "data_structure.xlsx")) %>% data.table()

updated_data <- reactive({
  if(input$type  == "Sector"){
    hazard_scores[Sector %in% input$sector]
  } else if(input$type == "Category"){
    hazard_scores[Category %in% input$category]
  }
})


# Colour palettes --------------------------------------------------------------

## Sector =====

sector_cols <- c("#56B4E9",
                          "#009E73",
                          "#0072B2",
                          "#F0E442")
                          
names(sector_cols) <- c("Aquaculture",
                        "Crops",
                        "Fisheries",
                        "Livestock")

## Hazard category =====

category_cols <- c("#CC6677",
                            "#44AA99",
                            "#6699CC",
                            "#AA4499")

names(category_cols) <- c("Biological",
                            "Chemical",
                            "Physical",
                            "Socio-economic")

# Plots

# of_plot <- reactive({
#   if(input$type == "Sector"){
#     ggplot(data = updated_data(), aes(x = Category, y = Score, fill = Category)) +
#       geom_col() +
#       scale_fill_manual(values = category_cols) +
#       theme_light() +
#       theme(text = element_text(size = 20),
#             legend.position = "none")
#   } else if(input$type == "Category"){
#     ggplot(data = updated_data(), aes(x = Sector, y = Score, fill = Sector)) +
#       geom_col() +
#       scale_fill_manual(values = sector_cols) +
#       theme_light() +
#       theme(text = element_text(size = 20),
#             legend.position = "none")
#   }
# })

of_plot <- reactive({
  if(input$type == "Sector"){
    ggplot(data = updated_data(), aes(x = Category, y = Score, fill = Category)) +
      geom_col() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = category_cols) +
      theme_light() +
      theme(text = element_text(size = 20),
            legend.position = "none")
  } else if(input$type == "Category"){
    ggplot(data = updated_data(), aes(x = Sector, y = Score, fill = Sector)) +
      geom_col() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = sector_cols) +
      theme_light() +
      theme(text = element_text(size = 20),
            legend.position = "none")
  }
})

# Plot
renderPlot({
    of_plot()
})
```
